thread.title: Elizabeth Birkhofer
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Elizabeth Birkhofer

author: Elizabeth Birkhofer
title: Elizabeth Birkhofer
text: Your shipping with a reasonable time frame is greatly appreciated. The products (8-Pack (10") Sediment Filters & 8-Pack O-Rings) that I ordered is very useful. For 4/5 stars which is why you pack this sediment filters in one plastic bag and it is unacceptable. Each water filter would be preferable to be sealed with plastic wrap and stocked up in order to avoid the dust in the laundry room.
